/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering structures. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise high into the overcast sky, their monotone palette punctuated by occasional splashes of red and blue. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and buses navigating their way through the urban landscape. On the right side of the street, a construction site is cordoned off by a blue fence, hinting at the city's continuous growth and development. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, encapsulating the city's architectural grandeur and the constant hum of activity.
